duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately post payments from various sources and ensure payments match bank deposit details.
Initiate outbound calls to insurance companies to inquire about missing or unallocated payments.
Review payer EOB’s and claim payments on a detailed line-item basis, ensuring proper application.
Adjust charge balances in accordance with Payer Explanation of Benefits (EOB) and payer contracts.
Research unapplied payments received and identify correct account or issue refunds if necessary.
Reconcile electronic lockbox transactions, electronic remittances, and EFT payments.
Post denial transaction messages and assist with processing appeals.
Reconcile check payments and update Database Reconciliation Log.
Process and record refunds on assigned client accounts.
Meet established deadlines and productivity/quality standards.
Balance all payments posted to bank deposits daily.
Identify appropriate escalation points and work with the Supervisor of Payment Posting.
